email.title: Email address
email.info: Do you want to change your email address? Change your email address by clicking on the button below. Note: you cannot log back into Grippenet until you have confirmed your new email address.

password.title: Password
password.info: Do you want to change your password? Change your password by clicking on the button below. Note: you need to enter your current password.

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.info: Edit your own profile or as a parent or legal guardian add a profile for your child (up to 17 years of age).

emailReminders.title: Weekly email and newsletter
emailReminders.info: You can choose to stop receiving the weekly reminder email or the newsletter.

defaultLanguage.title: Language
defaultLanguage.info: You can change the language here.

deletion.title: Unsubscribe from Grippenet / withdraw consent
deletion.warning:
If you unsubscribe from Grippenet / withdraw consent your account data will be deleted.
 After your account has been deleted we will no longer be able to link the information you have provided (for example age and symptoms) to you/your email address.
